pullRequest.body:
Make `isNoetherian_of_isNoetherianRing_of_finite an instance`: this was impossible in Lean 3 because of a loop.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

nodes.body: !bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/3c0076d1-7db6-435a-a781-704073f03d67) for commit a1ddc0e694d6c035d024d7fb7296ff4e1b0b8238.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/374cce3a-b3f4-4584-9ae5-e840477bba7e/to/3c0076d1-7db6-435a-a781-704073f03d67) against commit 3a722fdae3ff6029fce87e80670dd0cb82a689e2:
```diff
  Benchmark      Metric       Change
  ==================================
+ open Mathlib   wall-clock    -7.2%
```

Strange how it makes things faster. But I suggest we merge it.
maintainer merge
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by erdOne.
can we try remove all explicit calls of `isNoetherian_of_isNoetherianRing_of_finite` to see if it actually works in practice?

> can we try remove all explicit calls of `isNoetherian_of_isNoetherianRing_of_finite` to see if it actually works in practice?

Let me see.

I guess we can do the same for [Module.free_of_finite_type_torsion_free'](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/LinearAlgebra/FreeModule/PID.html#Module.free_of_finite_type_torsion_free'), maybe in another PR.
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/c05a88a7-a9ea-40a7-ba26-213ba8ac6b75) for commit 50c8364865cb19aa91967bdac5e8b27c7b9be595.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/374cce3a-b3f4-4584-9ae5-e840477bba7e/to/c05a88a7-a9ea-40a7-ba26-213ba8ac6b75) against commit 3a722fdae3ff6029fce87e80670dd0cb82a689e2.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7199427133/job/19611071853)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7199427133/job/19611071629)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7199427133/job/19611071131)

Thanks :tada:

bors merge

Thanks :tada:

bors merge
`set_option synthInstance.maxHeartbeats 50000 in` also works here, but `25000` is not enough anymore.
really crazy that it affects something here.
